info.name: wire.app.com (Wire messenger) Carbon x-small font
info.description:
Carbon Blue theme for Wire messenger's browser app @ app.wire.com. Font is set to x-small, per my personal preference.

Original Carbon Blue style @:
https://userstyles.org/styles/91347/carbon-blue
info.additionalInfo:
Based on Carbon Blue global style:
https://userstyles.org/styles/91347/carbon-blue

A variation on this theme without x-small font tag is available here:
https://userstyles.org/styles/138182/wire-app-com-wire-messenger-carbon-blue
